name: 36 kr
overview:
36kr.com is the No.1 new media driven web publication for technology in China. We are dedicated in focusing cutting edge technology news and Internet entrepreneurship. First named as TechCruch China Station, 36kr.com was founded in 2010 and renamed to current one on Dec 8th,2010. We are proud to name ourselves after the 36th chemical element as Kr, which believed is the key element in Planet Krypton, the native world of Superman.

As of Oct 2012, 36kr.com has over 1,200,000 RSS feed subscribers across multi-media platforms and over 100,000 enthusiastic followers on Weibo (Chinese Tiwtter). Our team aims at providing the most valuable tech news /analysis to Chinese tech fans, to bridge the gap between Chinese Internet entrepreneur and world innovation center. We are striving our way to be the best channel for Chinese tech reader to know about the most current and happening trend.

vc.36tr.com is an affiliated website of 36kr.com to provide wiki-style startup database. It has a networking of over 4,000 high quality startups and over 360 active investors. Our vision is to build and foster a seamless channel between web startups and investors in coming 3 years.

Oday (Open, Disrupt and You) is an annual event hosted by 36kr.com at 7 first-tier cities in China. It is one of the most anticipated technology event of the year which brings outstanding start-ups, influential speaker and high-profile investors together onto the stage. This is a platform for sharing and being disruptive. As of last year’s data, each event attracted more than 1,000 enthusiastic participants. Till now there are over 100 start-ups registered for product demo and 50 key-note speakers attended in total 20 events across China.
